name: GreenTea Press Books
description: More attractive fonts in gray tones. The color column has been removed to save space, while keeping the right column so as not to delete the author's request for feedback.
additional_info: First font selection requires Matthew Butterick's Equity, Concourse, and Triplicate fonts which can be obtained here: http://practicaltypography.com/equity.html. Alternatively, install the following free fonts: Fira Sant OT, Source Code Pro, and Bitstream Charter. The Bitstream link will take you to the Wikipedia page for the font. At the time of writing, there are links to downloads at the bottom of the page.
